changelog: This update fixes some weird logic around Lorule Graveyard, specifically to do with lamp/firerod related logic.
Cracks and Weather Vane locations are now trapezoid shaped. Cracks are slightly bigger than Weather Vanes so they're easier to distinguish.
Trial door settings logic is fixed, and should now actually be tracked properly.
This update adds compact versions of the map trackers
The settings have been moved to their own settings menu on all variants
The dungeon rewards have been re-introduced to the map
Dungeon locations on the Overworld maps are now slightly bigger
Trial door settings should now be tracked properly and show the trial door as active
The premium milk check at the Bouldering Guy now works properly
All cracks should now be in logic in cracksanity, with merge and quake, and some of the checks were updated for cracksanity as well
Hylian Shield AP item should now properly increment the shield item by two stages
Blacksmith check should now work properly
New item layout
Split horizontal/vertical map trackers
Reintroduced the item tracker, with functional item tracking (not portraits, pendants or weather vanes)
Premium Milk/Letter working again
Thief girl now reachable in tracker logic
Mother Maiamai checks are now disabled instead of cleared when nice items are shuffled or off
Death Mountain Maiamai now appear visually in front of item checks
More descriptive zip names, and excluded .git folder
Removed redundant files and images, resulting in a 20% file size compared to previous versions
Quake is now tracked if found manually (not initial_crack_state)
Open trials door should now be tracked
Swordless mode is now tracked
Settings are now auto-tracked
Checks with hard/glitched logic should now properly appear yellow instead of green
Rupee Rush and Dark Ruins South Wall Maiamai's are now in the right spot
Fixed the versions_url link in manifest.json for automatic updates
Master Ore getting auto-tracked properly
Hyrule Castle checks are now auto-tracked properly
Changed Mother Maiamai's location size until hover prevalence is fixed in PopTracker
Death Mountain Maiamai locations are now the right shape
